resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
Enter URL to the Quelea Mobile Remote server.
Failed to find the Quelea Mobile Remote server. Please make sure Quelea is started and that you\'ve entered the right URL.
URL seems to be incorrect. Make sure Quelea is started and enter URL to the Quelea Mobile Remote server.
Enter the password to the Quelea Mobile Remote server.
Do you want to add this song?
Select the song you want to add
Couldn\'t find any songs matching your search.
Add a song or a bible passage

This app is a non-profit app made to use with the open source church software Quelea (http://quelea.org). Although it\'s no longer in beta, it\'s surely not flawless yet nor is it feature complete. This is a side project and mostly meant for personal usage, but is gladly shared with anyone who might find it useful.

Feel free to send me an email at arvid@quelea.org if you have any questions or are experiencing issues, but make sure you\'ve started Quelea before the app (with both servers active), that both devices are connected to same network and that you\'ve entered the correct URL first.
I cannot guarantee a flawless experience, so I will not take responsibility for any issues that could occur in a live setting.
No server was found when trying to auto-connect. Please make sure Quelea and the auto-connect sever is started or enter URL manually.
Search for a song to add to your schedule

Search a song:
Search for a part of the song lyrics or the song title, press Enter and after a few seconds you will receive all the songs matching that search phrase.

Add a bible passage:
You separate the chapter mode a verse with a colon (:) and multiple verses in a row with a hyphen (-). If you would like to add several different verses to the same slide, you can separate each new verse with a comma (,) or a semicolon (;) and then write the full passage (including chapter). After you press Enter, you will receive a message if it was possible to add the passage or not.
Trying to add passage to your schedule…

Unfortunately you can\'t use ipv6 addresses. You need to use an ipv4 address to be able to use this app. If you don\'t know how to find it, google \'find local ip\' and the name of your operating system. Enter the ipv4 address/URL below.

I try hard to keep the app as stable as possible, but sometimes the app still crashes. Please help me solving this issue by providing me with helpful information about the context in which the error occurred.

By clicking \"Report\" an email will be generated with the crash log, which song was currently displayed, data about your phone and other information that could be helpful. Feel free to remove the information about your phone if you feel uncomfortable sharing that.
Thanks for your help and understanding!
Check the URL in your web browser to make sure that the URL works as it is supposed to.
Make sure wifi is enable on your phone and that you are connected to the same network as the computer with Quelea.
If you use the auto-connect feature, make sure you have enabled it in Quelea by adding \"use.auto.detect.server=true\" to the settings file located in the .quelea folder in the user directory.
Disable firewall and anti-virus temporarily to make sure that\'s not where the problem lies.
Check your router settings to make sure port forwarding is enabled. This is different for every brand so please consult your product manual for this.

Welcome to the troubleshooting guide. This will walk you through some of the most common causes for the connection to fail. To help me improve the app, please click \"This worked\" whenever you find something that works.
This means there\'s a problem with the app. Would you consider sending me an email with some information so I can solve this?
Unfortunately this means that the issue lies outside of the app, so I\'m afraid I can\'t solve this for you. Glad you have found some way of getting it to work at least!
Perfect! Then you should be able to use the app normally mode now on.
Sorry that you still can\'t get it to work! Would you like to send me an email so I can see if I could help you any further?
Your version of Quelea doesn\'t support this feature.

Unfortunately this app might only be partially translated to your language. Some of the words will be in English until they are added in a later update. Would you like to help me update the translation?
Something went wrong when trying to add the song.
Something went wrong when trying to add to save the fetched URL.

Just like the main software, the app is completely open source, meaning that you can view the source code of the app and contribute to improve it. You can find the source code here: https://github.com/quelea-projection/quelea-android-remote
Use the phone hardware volume buttons to navigate to next or previous slide/item.
Use dpad buttons (up/down) to navigate to next or previous slide/item. If you want to use a bluetooth keyboard or pedal (like AirTurn), activate this.
Click here to enter the URL to the Mobile Remote server.
Always try to auto-connect if stored URL does not work.
Select what you want the app to do when you navigate with either of the two options above and reach the end/beginning of an item.
Select what you want to happen if you long-press a button when you are navigating with either of the two options above. Note that this won\'t work with AirTurn pedals.
Select what you want to happen if you press two buttons at the same time when you are navigating with either of the two options above.
Choose what should happen if you swipe left or right on the screen.
Longer time means better result if you\'ve got a bad wifi connection, shorter means faster connection but could mean that server is found less often.
Choose a theme for the application
